BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  - “AN ACT authorizing and validating the alienation of certain parkland known as Empire Fulton Ferry state park in accordance with letters patent dated July 8, 2010 from the office of general services to the Brooklyn Bridge Park Development Corporation and master ground lease agreement dated as of July 29, 2010 for a term of 99 years to the Brooklyn Bridge Park Corporation providing for the use of such land as a part of the Brooklyn Bridge Park Civic and Land Use Improving Project”. S.7617, A.10586
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing and validating the alienation of certain parkland known as Empire Fulton Ferry state park in accordance with letters patent dated July 8, 2010. (S.7617, A.10586)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  - “AN ACT authorizing and validating the alienation of certain parkland known as Empire Fulton Ferry state park in accordance with letters patent dated July 8, 2010 from the office of general services to the Brooklyn Bridge Park Development Corporation and master ground lease agreement dated as of July 29, 2010 for a term of 99 years to the Brooklyn Bridge Park Corporation providing for the use of such land as a part of the Brooklyn Bridge Park Civic and Land Use Improving Project”. S.7617, A.10586
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing and validating the alienation of certain parkland known as Empire Fulton Ferry state park in accordance with letters patent dated July 8, 2010. (S.7617, A.10586)
